promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute rare elephant electric-type with yellow and teal hooves. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or electric. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Blitzef, a chibi cute rare elephant electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: spark, buzzy-buzz. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word elephant or electric or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, elephant-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: Blitzef dwells in rocky areas; its electric sparks can light up the night! Its buzzy-buzz creates an unforgettable song.
